value: <l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><del>Then</del> <del>a</del><add place="inline">A</add>gain the curtain rises; <add place="inline">&</add> the shadowy</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">insubstantial life that was <del>smothered</del> in</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><del>th</del> <del>in <rs type="place" ref="../resources/annotations.xml#pla-ches" key="Cheshire">Cheshire</rs>, at [illeg.], invisible</del></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><del>ought to</del> of the country squire, of the maid of</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">honour is <del>visible to us</del> is revealed. The</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><del>all</del> in a round, almost before we have had</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">time to settle in our seats, we are</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">in the thick of <del>real powers</del>: of love; of adultery</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">of murder. Everything is on tip toe. The</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">mute silent <del>loves</del> figures are seen in all</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">their [bravery?]. The pressure of unexpressed</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">emotion, <del>of the things that</del> has embodied itself</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">into [illeg.], into the figures of <rs type="person" ref="../resources/annotations.xml#psn-frana" key="Frankland">Frankland</rs> and <rs type="person" ref="../resources/annotations.xml#psn-franb" key="Frankland's Wife">his wife</rs>:</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">in <rs type="person" ref="../resources/annotations.xml#psn-wend" key="Wendoll">Wendoll</rs> the adulterer; in <rs type="person" ref="../resources/annotations.xml#psn-acto" key="Acton">Acton</rs> the</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">the supper is laid; the cards are on the table; &</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">the husband sees his wife lying [always?], in the</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">arms of her lover. <del>We</del> the old yellow pages,</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">with their blanks, their riddles, their [suppressions?]</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">that can no longer be deciphered, <del>are</del></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">give place to the outright downright speech.</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">In the play <add place="above">light</add> all is evident & [outspoken?]. In</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">real life all is hidden <add place="above">&</add> <del>covered</del> <del>over</del> suppressed:</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><del>the</del> <del>And</del> <del>The playwright has some of [colour?] in</del></l>

<add xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" place="margin">
              <l>all their concealed,</l>
              <l>all their suppressed</l>
              <l>[immediately?], as</l>
            </add>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><del>But how far can</del></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">Anonymity is fast dispersing. The <del>play</del> dramatist</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">is <del>becoming self [anxious?]. The play is coming to be</del></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><del>the merits the</del> And <del>at some point, the</del></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">the dramatist is emerging from the <del>old</del></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">juggler & the bear leader. He is <del>becoming</del></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">freeing himself from the compulsion of the audience.</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">He is <del>reserving</del> <del>A</del> <del>There is a</del> The</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><del>bodily, the actual,</del> If the body must still</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">dominate the little stage, if the</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">actual must be before the eye, & the</l>
